jobDescription: AndPlus is a custom software firm based just outside of Boston, MA in Southborough, MA. We are aggressively seeking another strong full stack web developer to our growing team here at AndPlus! Do you love solving complex problems, working on code with a focus on high quality? Are you bored with your current job or are you just looking for a position that challenges you literally every day? You might be right for this position. Here's some of what we're looking for:Strong ASP.NET MVC or Java Experience Senior level experience with front end Javascript frameworks (Backbone.js, Angular, jQuery, etc)Best working in C# and JavascriptStrong understanding of the separation of these two technologies and integrating the two together in unique and elegant waysStrong focus on coding standards - focus toward regular builds, frequently code checkins, and commitment to write unit tests for your productsIf the above looks or sounds like you, then email us your resume and cover letter - We look forward to hearing from you!
